132.content:
One day #1 #2 and #4 were all on a mission to locate a chain of attacks on team bases arpund the world and the KND and finnally tracked the attacker was to be found at. As they busted through the roof of a abandon building all they saw was a chair turn away from them. SHOW YOURSELF, #1 demanded. As the chqir turned around all they saw was a toddler about the age of 2 in the chair with a smug look on his face. All the boy was wearing was a shirt and a diaper.

#1 and #2 looked confused but #4 couldnt help himself to laugh. HAHAHAHAHAHAH, #4 laughed. I would edvise you to stop laughing, said the toddler with a stern voice. Or what, is little baby ganna cry,or, or is he going to wet his wittle diapee, he said taugnting the tot. No, but i will do this, as the tottler pulled out q ray gun and blasted #4 with it. But then all that remaned was his cloths. What have you done with #4, demanded #1. But by then the chair had transformed into a ship in the shape of a bottle and had blasted off. As the two boys ran over to the remaning cloths left behind by the fallen comrad a bump poped up to show #4's but his body was alot smaller. Infact #4 was only wearing a diaper. What happend to my he ? said in a babies voice. #4 had the same brain (besides the fact that he could only talk baby talk) but he was in the body of a baby

"Um...numbah one...I know this is awkward, but...will you...?" Numbah four asked. "No." Numbah one answered.
"Get Numbah three or Numbah five." Numbah one said.
"What is it, Numbah one?" Numbah five asked. "Well, Numbah four was turned into a baby. He appears to be owned year old, but, for noiw, he can still talk." Numbah one said. Numbah four started crying. "Aw, poor baby Numbah four!" Numbah three said. For some reason, she knew how to change a diaper and changed baby Numbah four. "There ya go!" Numbah three chirped.
